SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox

Interface IMAPMessageDescriptor

All Superinterfaces:
MessageDescriptor
public interface IMAPMessageDescriptor extends MessageDescriptor
Extended message descriptor for IMAP-specific metadata. This interface extends the basic MessageDescriptor with additional attributes required by the IMAP protocol.

IMAP clients can request various message attributes via FETCH, including flags, internal date, envelope, body structure, etc.

Author:
Chris Burdess

    Methods inherited from interface org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.MessageDescriptor

    getMessageNumber, getSize, getUniqueId

  • Method Details

    • getUID

      default long getUID()
      Returns the IMAP UID for this message. UIDs are unique within a mailbox and persistent across sessions. The default implementation returns the unique ID parsed as a long.
      Returns:
      the UID value

    • getFlags

      Set<String> getFlags()
      Returns the message flags.
      Returns:
      set of flag strings (e.g., "\\Seen", "\\Flagged")

    • getInternalDate

      OffsetDateTime getInternalDate()
      Returns the internal date of the message. This is the date/time the message was received by the server, not the Date header from the message itself.
      Returns:
      the internal date

    • isSeen

      default boolean isSeen()
      Returns whether the message has the \Seen flag.
      Returns:
      true if seen

    • isAnswered

      default boolean isAnswered()
      Returns whether the message has the \Answered flag.
      Returns:
      true if answered

    • isFlagged

      default boolean isFlagged()
      Returns whether the message has the \Flagged flag.
      Returns:
      true if flagged

    • isDeleted

      default boolean isDeleted()
      Returns whether the message has the \Deleted flag.
      Returns:
      true if marked for deletion

    • isDraft

      default boolean isDraft()
      Returns whether the message has the \Draft flag.
      Returns:
      true if draft

    • isRecent

      default boolean isRecent()
      Returns whether this is a recent message. A message is recent if this is the first session to see it.
      Returns:
      true if recent

    • getEnvelope

      default IMAPMessageDescriptor.Envelope getEnvelope()
      Returns the message envelope (RFC 2822 headers parsed into structure). This is used by IMAP FETCH ENVELOPE.
      Returns:
      the envelope, or null if not available

    • getBodyStructure

      default IMAPMessageDescriptor.BodyStructure getBodyStructure()
      Returns the body structure (MIME structure of the message). This is used by IMAP FETCH BODYSTRUCTURE.
      Returns:
      the body structure, or null if not available
